content.prompt: The makeup of the force shown in the image is best explained by the fact that by 1917

wartime propaganda had fueled fanatical loyalty to the Tsarist regime among ordinary Russians

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
